alert.note: Alert for Adair; Adams; Cass; Clarke; Decatur; Ringgold; Taylor; Union (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 09 at 3:23PM CST until March 10 at 6:00PM CST by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...Snow Expected Over Southern Iowa Tonight into Thursday... .An area of light to possibly moderate snow will spread into southwest Iowa tonight and across southern Iowa through Thursday with the bulk of the snow expected Thursday morning through afternoon. Some uncertainty remains as to how far north the snow will reach into Iowa, so some adjustments to the forecast may still take place. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches with local totals to around 4 inches along the Iowa Missouri border. * WHERE...Southern Iowa south of Interstate 80 with the heavier 2 to 4 inches south of Highway 34. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 6 PM CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute on Thursday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest travel conditions, check the Iowa 511 app, www.511ia.org or dial 511.

area.areaDesc: Adair; Adams; Cass; Clarke; Decatur; Ringgold; Taylor; Union
